actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Teachers' Salary Act of 1955 to increase salaries, and for other purposes.
short_title: District of Columbia Teachers' Salary Act Amendments

summary.text: District of Columbia Teachers' Salary Act Amendments - Increases, under the District of Columbia Teachers' Salary Act of 1955, the salaries for teachers, school officers, and other specified employees of the Board of Education. States that the amendments made by this Act shall become effective on the first day of the first pay period beginning on or after January 1, 1975.

titles.title: District of Columbia Teachers' Salary Act Amendments
A bill to amend the District of Columbia Teachers' Salary Act of 1955 to increase salaries, and for other purposes.
